job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This role is for a junior to mid-level engineer. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them.

   Responsibilities:
     * Hands-on AI/ML software engineer

     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design

     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain supporting systems

     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards

   路 Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams 路 Create appropriate data pipelines for AI/ML
     * Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data

     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

     * Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes

     * Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum

     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux

     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js

     * PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras, LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)

     * Vector indexing/database, LangChain, AutoGen, RAG, Agents

     * APIs GraphQL, REST

     * Docker, Kubernetes

     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

     * SQL (Postgres RDS/Aurora), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)

     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS

     * Monitoring - New Relic, Splunk

     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)
job_details.full_text:
AI/Machine Learning Engineer

This role is for a junior to mid-level engineer. The successful candidate will work closely with more senior engineers who will mentor and guide them.

   Responsibilities:
     * Hands-on AI/ML software engineer

     * Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

     * Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

     * Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design

     * Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain supporting systems

     * Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards

   路 Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams 路 Create appropriate data pipelines for AI/ML
     * Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data

     * Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

     * Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

     * Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes

     * Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization

   Environment, Tools & Technologies:
     * Agile/Scrum

     * Operating Systems - Mac, Linux

     * Python, JavaScript, Node.js

     * PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras, LLMs (OpenAI GPT-X, Claude, embedding models)

     * Vector indexing/database, LangChain, AutoGen, RAG, Agents

     * APIs GraphQL, REST

     * Docker, Kubernetes

     * Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

     * SQL (Postgres RDS/Aurora), NoSQL (Cassandra, Elasticsearch)

     * Messaging - Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS

     * Monitoring - New Relic, Splunk

     * GitHub, IDE (your choice)

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and development of generative AI technologies, including LLMs (GPT-X, Claude), RAG, Agents, and frameworks like LangChain and AutoGen. While it mentions ML technologies like PyTorch and Tensorflow, the core focus is on building products and applications leveraging generative AI, aligning with the definition and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer. The responsibilities also include building supporting systems and APIs, which are crucial for productionizing GenAI applications.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features' and 'Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams' indicate a need to understand business context and translate it into technical actions.
job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features

job_tasks.justification: This phrase shows the need to understand how new features will affect current services and teams, which is a business-level consideration.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams

job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of creating data pipelines for AI/ML tasks falls under data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI/ML

job_tasks.justification: Analyzing, curating, cleansing, and splitting data are fundamental data preprocessing steps in data engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze, curate, cleanse, and split data

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design' directly relates to the process of creating and selecting models.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design

job_tasks.justification: The explicit mention of utilizing and applying generative AI for products and productivity points to the core modeling aspect of GenAI.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity

job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies and designing patterns with proof-of-concept is part of the research and prototyping phase of modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept

job_tasks.justification: Being a 'Hands-on AI/ML software engineer' implies building and integrating AI/ML into software.
Designing, developing, and maintaining supporting systems is a core software development responsibility, especially for AI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain supporting systems

job_tasks.justification: Creating documentation, including system and sequence diagrams, is a standard software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams

job_tasks.justification: The mention of GraphQL and REST APIs indicates software development for integration and service provision.
Developing best practices and improving operational processes directly relates to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes

job_tasks.justification: The technologies listed (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Azure, Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, New Relic, Splunk) are all indicative of MLOps and infrastructure management.
Cloud platforms are essential for deploying and managing AI/ML services in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Amazon Web Services (AWS), MS Azure OpenAI

job_tasks.justification: Messaging queues are often used in distributed systems for MLOps pipelines.
Monitoring tools are critical for maintaining and troubleshooting production AI systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
Collaborate with team to design, develop, and maintain supporting systems
Present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house AI/ML technology and design
Participate in developing best practices and improving operational processes
